attributes.action: Consider issuing Large Capital Projects like the £7bn Rail Project to British companies with a 70% buy british clause
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the award of £7bn contract for the new rolling stock to a Japanese company, whose economy is this government trying to recover?  Projects of this size should be awarded to Vritish Companies with a 70% buy british clause - Does the Prime Minister really think that British companies and people are going to benefit from this award.  We have a struggling rail industry in the UK and this contract is the nail in the coffin to another Great British Industry.  How much is the taxpayer really going to save after it has essentially paid for Hitachi to set up "assembly" plants through grants and the like plus the cost of benefits to the workers in the current rail industry who will lose their jobs.  Think again and make this contract british - REALLY BRITISH!!
